Package com.rodrigohacks.atm.daolayer

Class DataAccessLayer

java.lang.Object
com.rodrigohacks.atm.daolayer.DataAccessLayer
public class DataAccessLayer extends Object
DataAccessLayer class provides methods to interact with the database. It uses dotenv library to load environment variables for database connection.
